about.title: About SmilingCups
about.subtitle: Connecting coffee lovers with exceptional producers from around the world
about.mission_text:
At SmilingCups, we believe that great coffee starts with great relationships. We connect specialty coffee producers directly with enthusiasts who appreciate their craft.

Our platform empowers small-scale producers to reach a global audience while ensuring coffee lovers get access to the freshest, most authentic specialty coffees available.
about.value_quality_text: We only work with producers who share our commitment to excellence and sustainable practices.
about.value_transparency_text: Know exactly where your coffee comes from and how it's produced, from farm to cup.
about.value_sustainability_text: Supporting ethical practices and environmental stewardship in coffee production worldwide.
about.community_text: Whether you're a coffee enthusiast or a specialty producer, there's a place for you in the SmilingCups community.
